Download the Latest Secret Song by Moon Bounce

posted by Adrienne Black on December 16, 2014 in Audio

Image via Soundcloud

The latest single in Ryan Hemsworth’s Secret Songs series comes from an artist named Moon Bounce. He provides us with a track simply named “Body” which he explains was made as a way to celebrate his lady’s body. ” It’s my raunchiest song to date but also the purest,” says Moon Bounce. The former may be true, but it’s a detail that you’ll either be able to simply look over and will completely win you over. Either way, Moon Bounce found a way to make his raunchiest song into a very catchy one.

With a name like Moon Bounce, it’s no surprise that “Body” has an appropriate amount of bounce in the rhythm. The track starts off with enough varying sounds to draw you in, but in a relaxed tone that encourages you to just nod along. However, by the three minute mark the bounce really kicks in and forces you to do a little footwork.

Listen to and download “Body” below.
